Here are the two references I pursued:

http://www.cs.rice.edu/~mgricken/r=
esearch/concutest/concjunit/

This looked interesting, but I wasn't quite r=
eady to take on trying to get this integrated with my Eclipse environment.
=

section on this page, "Test Thread Safety", gave me something that was easy=
